Name: Maly
description:
Maly is 29 years old who lives with her family in her own house at Kampong Cham Province of Cambodia. She is a cashew farmer in the community and earns money per day to expend on her family needed.

She is hard working and is determined to have a successful life. However, this past year she has faced problems because of agriculture of economic difficulties during Covid-19 crisis, which has decreased her low income. She would like to request a loan to purchase fertilizers, soils, cashew seeds to plant when the next season comes.

Finally she hopes all lenders give her supporting to reach the next step levels, could make her giant the profits.
